feed.title: Workout Tracker Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Workout Tracker: v1.16.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Parse extention nodes and standardize extra metric names by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/196
  • Create nb_NO.json by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/197
  • Add Norwegian as a language in the app by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/198
  • Add some basic way to show custom statistic ranges by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/199
  • Add options to change the range and bucket size of statistics by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/200
  • Add more ranges by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/201
  • Skip updates for non-GPX based workouts by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/203

Full Changelog: https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/compare/v1.16.4...v1.16.5

entry.title: New release for Workout Tracker: v1.17.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add a changelog system and the changelog by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/204
  • Update meta-information and add extra Weblate link by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/207
  • Add support to update manually added workouts by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/208
  • Improve input of location for manual workouts by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/209
  • Allow partial location by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/210
  • Update changelog by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/211
  • Automate changelog commit (and exclude changelog updates from changelog) by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/212
  • Exclude some commits from the changelog by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/213

Full Changelog: https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/compare/v1.16.5...v1.17.0

entry.title: New release for Workout Tracker: v1.17.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add direct link to changelog in the footer by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/214
  • Show a message per user when the application was updated by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/215
  • fix: add version notice styles and template by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/216
  • fix: support editing workouts using Imperial units by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/218
  • Fix the input files and configuration for better Weblate integration by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/219
  • Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/220
  • Update changelog by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/221

Full Changelog: https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/compare/v1.17.0...v1.17.1

entry.title: New release for Workout Tracker: v1.18.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: calculate rate limit time remaining by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/222
  • refactor: improve API button style and behavior by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/223
  • feat: refactor workouts handlers to use HasFile method instead of nilâ€¦ by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/224
  • docs: add generic upload API endpoint usage documentation by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/227
  • Create FUNDING.yml by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/228
  • docs: add more badges and direct link to swagger spec editor by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/229
  • chore: update all dependencies by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/230
  • fix: updated README.md with correct badge links by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/231
  • chore: remove legacy attributes by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/232

Full Changelog: https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/compare/v1.17.1...v1.18.0

entry.title: New release for Workout Tracker: v1.18.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: add function to get filename of workout by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/233

Full Changelog: https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/compare/v1.18.0...v1.18.1
